name: DSCP Mapping Based on ARP and QCI
summary: This feature introduces support for DSCP configuration in the transport network QoS

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.dscpArpMap
parameters.description: See MOM description.  The attributes reference struct DscpArpMap. The struct has                                 the following members:  dscpArp1     dscpArp2     dscpArp3     dscpArp4     dscpArp5     dscpArp6     dscpArp7     dscpArp8     dscpArp9     dscpArp10     dscpArp11     dscpArp12     dscpArp13     dscpArp14     dscpArp15

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.dscpArpMap
parameters.description: See MOM description.  The attributes reference struct DscpArpMap. The struct has                                 the following members:  dscpArp1     dscpArp2     dscpArp3     dscpArp4     dscpArp5     dscpArp6     dscpArp7     dscpArp8     dscpArp9     dscpArp10     dscpArp11     dscpArp12     dscpArp13     dscpArp14     dscpArp15

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.dscp
parameters.description: If the QciProfilePredefined.dscpArpMap is set to                                 the default values, the QciProfilePredefined.dscp                                 is used. Otherwise, the values of                                     QciProfilePredefined.dscpArpMap are used.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.dscp
parameters.description: If the QciProfileOperatorDefined.dscpArpMap is                                 set to the default values, the                                     QciProfileOperatorDefined.dscp is used.                                 Otherwise, the values of                                     QciProfileOperatorDefined.dscpArpMap are                                 used.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012382 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012382 MO instance.
